questions.text: People I exercise or train with (shared physical activity) are ...

answers.5: integral — shared physical activity is how I connect

questions.text: People who push my physical development (challenge me to do more) are ...

answers.4: regular — I have people who push me
answers.5: consistent — mutual physical challenge is normal
answers.3: some — a few people in certain activities
answers.1: none — no one challenges me physically

questions.text: Holding others accountable for physical health/fitness is ...

answers.5: mutual — we hold each other accountable
answers.1: not my place — I stay out of that

questions.text: Sharing physical activities (sports, hiking, movement) as connection is ...

answers.4: common — physical activity is social for me
answers.5: central — shared movement is how I connect
answers.1: rare — physical activity is solo for me

questions.text: Physical fellowship relationships improving my actual fitness is ...

answers.5: substantial — these relationships have transformed my physical life
